description:
The Trailbreaker Tour Pants are an all-in-one, versatile solution for backcountry touring and ski mountaineering. These pants feature a bluesign® approved breathable softshell upper leg fabric that is abrasion-resistant and stretchy for ease of movement and a waterproof lower leg fabric that sheds snow for added protection in deep powder.

The stretchy, movement-mirroring fabric ensures a full range of motion, whether on the skin track or the summit ridge. With a comfortable fit and various pockets for storage, the Trailbreaker Tour Pants are a go-to pant for alpine adventures.
name: Outdoor Research Trailbreaker Tour Pants - Mens
